body_html: @bcaine Awesome! Tests for gradients are pretty easy: just use tf.test.compute_gradient_error and verify that the error is small (1e-4 or 1e-3, typically, due to numerical differences). You can look at other compute_gradient_error examples and mimic.
body_text: @bcaine Awesome!  Tests for gradients are pretty easy: just use tf.test.compute_gradient_error and verify that the error is small (1e-4 or 1e-3, typically, due to numerical differences).  You can look at other compute_gradient_error examples and mimic.
body: @bcaine Awesome!  Tests for gradients are pretty easy: just use `tf.test.compute_gradient_error` and verify that the error is small (1e-4 or 1e-3, typically, due to numerical differences).  You can look at other `compute_gradient_error` examples and mimic.
